共和党人曾经希望政府退出医疗保健。特朗普选民认为这是不同的。像许多投票支持唐纳德·特朗普的美国人一样，杰森·鲁斯（Jason Rouse）希望总统的回报将意味着汽油，杂货和其他必需品的价格降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/republicans-once-wanted-government-out-of-health-care-trump-voters-voters-voters-voters-see-it-iffery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/republicans-once-wanted-government-out-of-health-care-trump-voters-voters-voters-voters-see-see-it-indiffery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29a2fbc1-a73c-421f-9E53-e53-e1e5c98f4214 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 08:08:39 -0500 Republicans once wanted government out of health care. Trump voters see it differently.
新研究确认跳绳是有效的有氧运动研究人员研究高强度或中等强度的绳索是否可以改善心肺健康和身体成分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-study-confirms-rope-skipping-as-as-an-efferce-cardio-workout.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250227/new-study-confirms-rope-skipping-as-as-an-efferce-cardio-workout.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9559F573-2783-4A05-BFAD-0EDC07229817 Thu, 27 Feb 2025 07:31:00 -0500 New study confirms rope skipping as an effective cardio workout
研究发现一项小儿研究的研究发现，身体健康水平较高的学龄前儿童在记忆，注意力和解决问题的任务中的表现明显更好，从而强调了运动在早期认知发展中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/preschoolers-with-better-fitness-have-have-have-sharper-brains-brins-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/preschoolers-with-better-fitness-have-have-sharper-brains-brains-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A05156B-8B-8B31-485D-BAF5-CBE170BA62C4 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 23:12:00 -0500 Preschoolers with better fitness have sharper brains, study finds
推出了新的15分钟工具，用于筛选视觉感知问题的屏幕中风幸存者达勒姆大学和牛津大学的研究人员推出了一种新的15分钟的工具，用于筛选视觉感知问题的中风幸存者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-15-minute-tool-launched-to-screen-screen-sstroke-survivors-for-visual-perceptual-pcectual-pcection-proception-promblems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/new-15-minute-tool-launched-to-screen-screen-stroke-survivors-for-visual-pocceual-pocceual-pocceual-perception-proceproblems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A0A4EC54-B356-4DE3-9AA2-870FAFE2E58C Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:31:00 -0500 New 15-minute tool launched to screen stroke survivors for visual perception problems
研究发现，早期负重可用于脚踝骨折恢复密苏里大学医学院的一项新研究表明，在从手术修复的骨折中恢复后的三周内，将重量放在脚踝（也称为负重轴承）上是安全的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/study-finds-weight-weight-beration-safe-for-ankle-ankle-fractracture-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/study-finds-weight-weight-barearch-safe-for-ankle-ankle-for-for-fracture-fracture-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5401F525-8E1A-448E-AED-AED6-91F38CA4DB59 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:27:41 -0500 Study finds early weight bearing safe for ankle fracture recovery
研究发现，早期生命增长塑造了成人身高，但对青春期的时机影响不大。早期生命的增长与青春期的生长和成人身高密切相关，但并没有显着影响青春期的时机，强调了遗传学和早期发展的复杂相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/early-life-growth-shapes-adult-height-height-height-but-has-little-fittle-fittle-fittle-fitect-on-puberty-on-puberty-timing-timing-timing-tudy-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/early-life-growth-shapes-adult-height-height-height-but-has-little-fittle-effect-on-puberty-on-puberty-timing-timing-timing-timing-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41785938-e366-437e-a2fe-ddb9731ac197 Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:22:00 -0500 Early life growth shapes adult height but has little effect on puberty timing, study finds
数字秋季预防计划改善了老年人的姿势和平衡加州大学圣地亚哥分校的研究人员透露了一项评估大学“强大基础”计划的研究结果，这是一项针对老年人的数字化秋季预防计划。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/digital-fall-prevention-program-improgram-improgram-postrogram-posture-and-balance-inder-----------in golder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/digital-fall-prevention-program-rompragrmen-program-improgram-posture--posture-and-balance-ind offer-Adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1263fcae-CBAB-44B9-8290-B856D1C4C33D Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:18:10 -0500 Digital fall prevention program improves posture and balance in older adults
与乳房切除术相比对于乳房切除术，乳房重建，乳腺癌疗法（BCT）与乳房切除术相比，乳腺癌治疗（BCT）与改善性健康有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/breast-conserving-theraphy-therapy-the-to-better-sexual--sexual-being-being-bempempemprepare-comparpared-prempared to-mastsofe.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/breast-conserving-theraphy-therapy-the-to-better-sexual-well-well-being-be- be comparpareed-comparpreped-to-mastered to-mastosement.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0d80bc3-27c7-49c4-49c4-85a7-edf5666d0dbbe Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:13:00 -0500 Breast-conserving therapy linked to better sexual well-being compared to mastectomy
皮质类固醇的使用与狼疮性心包炎的较高风险有关一项针对2900多名患者的新研究提供了证据，表明最好在治疗患有狼疮性心包炎的人时使用尽可能少的皮质类固醇药物，这是自身免疫性疾病全身性狼疮的常见心脏并发症（SLE）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/corticosteroid-use-linked-to-higher-rink-risk-of-of-of-lupus-corcardis-recarrence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/corticosteroid-use-linked-to-higher-rink-righer-rupus-lupus-cercardis-corrence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d3b63f7-5fc9-4932-bab7-63aae3a658be Wed, 26 Feb 2025 22:06:50 -0500 Corticosteroid use linked to higher risk of lupus pericarditis recurrence
更大的高温暴露可能会加速老年人的生物衰老一项新的南加州大学伦纳德·戴维斯（Leonard Davis）老年学院研究表明，更大的暴露于极热的人可能会加速老年人的生物老化，这引起了人们对气候变化和热浪如何影响分子水平上的长期健康和衰老的新担忧。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/greater-expuse-to-to-extreme-heat-heat-may-accelerate-biolate-biological-dogical-ingaging-in-seniors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250226/greater-expuse-to-to-extreme-heat-heat-heat-may-accelerate-biological-dogical-vaging-in-seniors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3A0D1793-83A1-4CAB-BCA7-256EDCBB20EE Wed, 26 Feb 2025 21:49:49 -0500 Greater exposure to extreme heat may accelerate biological aging in seniors
